RelatedSentence: LONDON ( Alliance News ) - Tungsten Corp PLC Monday said its e - invoicing network has been contracted to roll out a multi-year invoicing programme into every General Electric Co operation globally , with potential invoice volumes of over 16.0 million per year .

Tungsten provides services to customers with the aim of facilitating trade by streamlining invoice processing , improving cash - flow management , and helping to them to make better buying decisions from detailed spend data .

Tungsten provides services to customers with the aim of facilitating trade by streamlining invoice processing , improving cash - flow management , and helping to them to make better buying decisions from detailed spend data .
Under the agreement , Fairfield , Connecticut - based GE also will take Tungsten 's invoice status service .
Tungsten Corp says the network can reduce invoice - processing costs by 60 % .
Tungsten Corp says the network can reduce invoice - processing costs by 60 % .

Tungsten Network is accelerating its expansion , with another new customer choosing us to offer electronic invoicing services globally - on a scale comparable with the entire volume of invoices being transacted over the network last year , Edmund Truell , chief executive , said in a statement .

Tungsten Network is accelerating its expansion , with another new customer choosing us to offer electronic invoicing services globally - on a scale comparable with the entire volume of invoices being transacted over the network last year , Edmund Truell , chief executive , said in a statement .

Tungsten Network is accelerating its expansion , with another new customer choosing us to offer electronic invoicing services globally - on a scale comparable with the entire volume of invoices being transacted over the network last year , Edmund Truell , chief executive , said in a statement .
Tungsten said results for the full - year to April 30 will be announced in July .
